channel.title: Comments on: The Bitcoin Podcast: Episode #1

item.title: By: Clem
item.dc:creator: Clem
item.description:
GPUs.... grrr.. I'm still sitting on shares of AMD that took a shit because I was hoping that all that mining would drive the price of AMD up :)
lesson. learned. damn you corey.
